column4: if you have a directory say firefox that is visible and you want it invisible  i know i could make a directory .firefox and it would be infivisible but do i simply rename the current dir of "firefox" to ".firefox" ? if so what command plz
try it, if it doesn't work...change it back
just change the folder name, then redirect your link to the new hidden folder
change where it says /firefox to say ./firefox
